identified-content.org: Caisse De Depot Et Placement Du Quebec
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

abstract.p: Quebec government's pension fund, Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec, and private-sector partner, Quebecor Inc, win control of province's largest cable television company, Groupe Videotron Ltd, with $3.3 billion all-cash offer

block.p: The Quebec government's pension fund and a private-sector partner, Quebecor Inc., have won control of the province's largest cable television company, Groupe Videotron Ltd., with a $3.3 billion all-cash offer. The two topped a bid by Rogers Communications Inc. of Toronto. Rogers withdrew its bid yesterday and will be paid a $163 million breakup fee. The value of its offer had fallen below the all-cash counter-bid of about 4.9 billion Canadian dollars from the Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec, the provincial pension fund, and Quebecor, a Montreal media company.

The Quebec government's pension fund and a private-sector partner, Quebecor Inc., have won control of the province's largest cable television company, Groupe Videotron Ltd., with a $3.3 billion all-cash offer. The two topped a bid by Rogers Communications Inc. of Toronto. Rogers withdrew its bid yesterday and will be paid a $163 million breakup fee. The value of its offer had fallen below the all-cash counter-bid of about 4.9 billion Canadian dollars from the Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec, the provincial pension fund, and Quebecor, a Montreal media company.
